name: Raise Morale

passives.name: Raise Morale
passives.effects: {{ci|Gangplank}} and his allies within {{ai|Cannon Barrage|Gangplank}} gain {{as|40% '''bonus''' movement speed}}, which persists for 2 seconds after leaving the area.

effects_structured.raw: Gangplank and allies within Cannon Barrage gain 40% bonus movement speed, persisting 2 seconds after leaving the area.

simpleDescription: Allies in the Cannon Barrage gain <speed>bonus Move Speed</speed>.

schema_notes.effects_structured: Parsed from passive/active text for simulation use.
context_notes: Effect is tied to Gangplank's Cannon Barrage area.
